nodes.text: Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook

Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook was a roleplaying guide published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was written by Michael Allen Horne and was first published in November 1993.
The book summarizes and details the events of the first two books in Brian Daley's The Han Solo Adventures trilogy of novels.
Chapter One: Han and Chewie's Exploits
Chapter Two: History of the Corporate Sector
Chapter Six: Authority Executives and Operatives
Chapter Seven: Personalities of the Sector
